abstract: Companies that received the highest scores for customer satisfaction included Barnes & Noble, Borders and Amazon.
snippet: Companies that received the highest scores for customer satisfaction included Barnes & Noble, Borders and Amazon.
lead_paragraph: Who gets it right? According to a recent survey by Forrester Research, the businesses that leave customers the most satisfied are retailers, hotels and insurance companies. Who is more likely to get it wrong? The industries with the lowest scores included Internet service providers, TV service providers and health insurance plans.

headline.main: Can Bookstores Teach Others a Thing or Two?
headline.print_headline: Can Bookstores Teach Others a Thing or Two?
